channel.title: Change connection ip 554 client
channel.description: Hi i need some im thinking about to start with 554 and stop with 317s buth i got problems with client i can not find where i can change the ip :p stupid question i k'now buth help please ?

item.title: Change connection ip 554 client
item.dc:creator: @josh124 josh124
item.description:
@josh124 wrote:

Hello, Ok so go to the files “Applet_sub1.java” & search 127.0.0.1 OR no-ip then change the Current IP to Yours.

2). Go to Client.java and do the same.

Hope this helped, Im new to 554’s my self but i cant get my friend to connect and iv tried all the IP changing in the server file and the Client file but anyway. Enjoy if this helped.

Read full topic
